mapper.select: select question_id,content,point,isright,pic_path,corrected_pic from solution where study_id=#{studyId} AND student_id=#{studentId} AND (isright is null or isright="")
mapper.insert: insert into solution (student_id , study_id , question_id , content,pic_path,isright) values (#{studentId},#{studyId},#{questionId},#{solutionContent},#{picPath},#{isRight})
mapper.update: update solution set correctedPic=#{picId},point=#{point},isright=#{isright} where student_id=#{studentId} AND study_id=#{studyId} AND question_id=#{questionId}
update solution set point=#{point},isright=#{isright},content=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where student_id=#{studentId} and study_id=#{paperId} and question_id=#{questionId}
mapper.select: select solution.student_id,solution.paper_id,solution.question_id,solution.content from solution join question on solution.question_id=question.question_id and question.option_a is not null
